Summary: pulsating orange and white lights, hovering then moving, boomerang shaped.
trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Sterling Heights
There were no other sightings in Sterling Heights on or around November 27th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsThese are the ufos that have been appearing on Thursday nights. Last night was Tuesday, Nov. 27. There were orange and white lights that got really bright then slowly dimmed. It hovered then moved slowly. We observed some kind of a plane miles to the East, probably coming from Selfridge air base. It was heading towards the object for about five minutes. By the time that the plane reached the ufo it dimmed down to nothing and vanished. This was the brightest that the object has ever gotten. I took 18 pictures. Of course it was so far away that the pictures are not that great.
